website_summaries.verdict: A good underwater camera that is safe down to 148'.
pros: Compatible with mounts from other brands of action cameras
Comes with a remote control for your wrist
cons: Doesn't come with a selfie stick or a memory card

customer_reviews.title: 4K Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: We had previous excellent experience with AV products by this company so I figured we would try and save some money on a 4K camera my son had been wanting for awhile. Well the votes are in ...It is A winner. Pretty easy to set up and start using right away. Just so much fun and has wonderful features. The screen and watch controller are super cool. He loves it. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 00_jackie_00

customer_reviews.title: No exchanges possible on defected product
customer_reviews.text: I am greatly disappointed to find that exchanges are not available. Therefore if you purchase an item on a flash sell and receive a defected product you can return it for a refund. However you are stuck repurchasing at the higher price of the product. The camera never worked it would hard lock as soon as I turned it on, the only method of unlocking was to pull the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Unusable ... Nothing on this camera works.
customer_reviews.text: The menu system really does not work at all. There is no way to exit settings and take videos or pictures. There are no timelapse settings at all on this camera. It does not even function as a PC camera via USB cable. There is nothing on this camera that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Martin D. Kimzey

customer_reviews.title: It's a steal!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my GoPro from a recent trip. Didn't want to spend too much money to get a replacement. So instead, I bought this camera. I didn't have high hope since comparing with GoPro, this camera is so cheap. But it was better than I expected! It came with many accessories including a remote control!
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Decent Camera
customer_reviews.text: Product is sometimes hard to work around to find different settings. The compact design make it very easy to handle when I SCUBA dive. The app that pairs with this comes in chinese so finding the language and making it english was difficult. Overall decent product and would recommend to and people wanting undersater pictures without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: wow!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little touchscreen action camera. I was searching for a Go-Pro alternative that I didn't have to worry about when traveling.I am a skydiver, I appreciate the need for versatility and ease of use so I don't have to think about too many things when in the air. And the price is fantastic。highly recommend this sport camera.
customer_reviews.author: ANDY

customer_reviews.title: The case filled with water immediately and shorted out the ...
customer_reviews.text: The case filled with water immediately and shorted out the camera. Boo. I was just jumping in the water so I didn’t even get to 3 ft. Wont buy again
customer_reviews.author: Adventure on a Budget

customer_reviews.title: perfect camera!
customer_reviews.text: It's looks awsome! It's light and easy control. I put it on my hat when I am fishing. The video is clearly and awsome! The battery could last a long-time without charge. I plan to put it on my drone for it's light weight.
customer_reviews.author: jasontian

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well  in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes good video and pictures but does not work well in cold weather. I took skiing in 15-25 degree weather and camera would just freeze up. I had a replacement sent and camera acted the same. Also after charging battery it basically was out of power after 2 hours of not even using.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. it does what it suppose to be
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. it does what it suppose to be. At this price I cant ask for more. The 30m water reproof is an A+. Cant wait to use it in summer time.
customer_reviews.author: Pui Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a professional diver. Came across this touchscreen action camera which I need it underwater for easy maneuver. Besides, it has the 4K video capability. It gives a clearer and crisp video underwater. This action camera feels really solid and it doesn’t feel a bit flimsy. Great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Amaxon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect ex7000 camera
customer_reviews.text: Super good touchscreen action camera, good for vacation. I could use it under the water and when I go zip lining. Kinds of parts inside. I'll go to skiing with it next month. I am so glad to have this sports camera.
customer_reviews.author: Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service. I had an issue with the first one I ordered, but the seller immediately sent me a new one that works perfectly. Great, lower cost alternative to GoPro. Would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DBPower camera rivals the competition
customer_reviews.text: Great action camera and is a great value for the price. Clear and crisp videos in Mov format. Found them very easy to convert to AVI for my CD player. Love the built in features.
customer_reviews.author: R.J.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage do NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Both units failed on me. Both would not stay powered up after charging. Stay AWAY!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 15 year old. He uses this for hunting and fishing. It’s easy to use and seems very durable. He is really enjoying it. Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. My.son wanted an action cam. I've tested it and so far it's great. I'm excited to see what he comes up with.
customer_reviews.author: Valerye Mehl

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it looks like it may work for me
customer_reviews.text: Product works as it was intended and clearer picture than any Go Pro on the Market today. Will looks for additional claps. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is so easy to use. Love the touch screen and everything about this.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a first go-pro sort of thing to test with do like it would use again
customer_reviews.author: Chase Weigand

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures
customer_reviews.text: I took some random pictures and I am really amazed with the picture quality. This has touch screen which makes operation easier. It comes with various attachments which can be used as needed. I am planning to use it with my drone.The waterproof casing looks good and I need to try it in beach or swimming pool. The still pictures are crisp and clear. There is wifi option to transfer data quickly. The battery life still needs to be tested and a few cycles of charging will make it consistent. Connecting to the app might be tricky and behavior is different from phone to phone
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: I love the touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: I love the touchscreen! I have a older version of this camera and the Touchscreen is really a huge plus! The sound and picture quality are stellar and the feel of the camera is much more stout than the others I have tried. The price was just right and I cant say how thrilled I was with the accessories and packaging. I like that while attaching it to my Malinois while she is working I don't hear too much wind or background noise!
customer_reviews.author: Beachbum22Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with customer service
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a Christmas gift and never properly worked. The SD card connection was bad. Unfortunately, the recipient didn’t tell me before the return window closed. Initially, I rated this product as a 1 star. The company initiated contact with me and offered to either replace the camera or refund my purchase price. Since I had already purchased a camera from another manufacturer, DB Power refunded my full purchase price. I am very impressed with their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: William Gaudinier

customer_reviews.title: The action camera is best use for capturing memories or incredible moments of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The action camera is best use for capturing memories or incredible moments of the places you have went. It’s a touch screen camera that have different modes. I once connected it to the phone and it worked very well. It also comes with a watch that can be connected. It only takes about three hour for the battery to be full. It is cool for people that often go out to play in different places.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Definitely worth the price. I love how it is lightweight and portable. The touchscreen also makes it easier to use. Also love it is water resistant. Definitely recommend it. Looking forward to use it for my next adventure!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. It's smaller than I expected, but takes great pictures. My only problem is that the instructions were not as clear as they could be. It took me some time to even figure out where the camera was, since it came pre-installed in the underwater helmet attachment...which I didn't even know it had!! I was shocked to see the remote control "watch" in the package. I was just expecting a camera...not a SUPER camera! The instructions are the only problem I see with this camera. Fix them and it is a solid 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: june

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: pictures and movies look nice for the price point (less than $50 with flash deal). Battery does not last very long when filming (20 min or so). Took 2 stars off because I cannot find additional batteries anywhere. The polarity and size is different from all batteries I checked on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch Girl

customer_reviews.title: This touchscreen Wi-Fi action camera has pretty much everything GoPro has
customer_reviews.text: I received this 4k ultra HD action camera as a Christmas gift from my sister. She knew that I was planning on a ski trip in mid-January, so she bought it and gave it to me for the ski trip. I was going to buy a GoPro but it is so expensive. This touchscreen Wi-Fi action camera has pretty much everything GoPro has! I used it last week for my ski trip in CO-it works really well. The pictures and the videos are super clear! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: The camera seemed like it would be great. Cute size, durable, good picture. But after less than 5 minutes of turning it on and trying to set it up the touchscreen quit working. Returned it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Meneley

customer_reviews.title: Can’t buy spare battery, 90 minutes and done..  Considering to return!
customer_reviews.text: Touch screen, good value not true 4K but it’s decent. Update for the EX7000, extra battery is provided for the camera now. Camera is very simple to use, 1 push to power on, touch screen to zoom (4x). In addition, i used this camera as a dash cam. Great price for this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Chang

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: It looks well manufactured but have not used it yet. Will update later.
customer_reviews.author: LoveDog

customer_reviews.title: It works great and quality is really good
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a action camera add this to your list. It works great and quality is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Hina khowaja

customer_reviews.title: Great price easy to use! Quality images
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera so far easy to use and understand!!
customer_reviews.author: Tawodi

customer_reviews.title: picture is not as good as it's claimed
customer_reviews.text: Even thought it sais it shoots in 4k ,picture is not as good as it's claimed. A little dissapointed. All in all though it's a great piece, comes with a waterproof case.deff worth its price compare to GoPro
customer_reviews.author: Masha Ivanova

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: the camera stopped working after 10 uses. The Touch screen and buttons stopped working leaving dead device on hand.
customer_reviews.author: MK

product_meta.title: EYESKY LiPo Charger 1S-6S Digital Battery Balance Discharger 80W 6A for Li-ion Life NiCd NiMH LiHV PB Smart Battery … (b)
feature_bullets: GOES BEYOND A NORMAL CAMERA-Versatile but compact, this action camera features 4K resolution, 2 Inch TFT Touchscreen, Image Stabilization, Adjustable FOV, Scene Modes, etc. ,bringing this camera to more applicable conditions beyond your expectation. It is not recommended to take the camera to record videos in high resolution when the battery is too low. It is common that the camera will get warm after a long time of usage to take videos in high resolution especially for the fact that this action camera is with a 2 inch LCD touch screen.

148FT WATERPROOF CAMERA AND TOUCHSCREEN-Coupled with a high quality waterproof case, this camera is completely waterproof to a depth of more than 148ft, making capturing underwater a breeze right out of box. An intuitive 2 inch touchscreen promotes you more ease to operate this action camera without too much hassle. .

4K ULTRA HD RESOLUTION-Featuring 14MP stunning color images and up to 4K 25fps Ultra HD Videos thanks to a high-end Panasonic image sensor, this EX7000 action camera captures you well-detailed imagery down to every detail of your wonderful outdoor adventures. .

WORLD-CLASS CUSTOMER SERVICE- Your satisfaction is 100% GUARANTEED. This action camera is covered by 24-hour 7-day after-sales service without any additional charge to promote you a hassle-free purchase experience for a whole year. We promise you'll be more than thrilled, so click "Add to Cart" and enjoy this action camera now

SPORTS CAMERA SUPPORTS WIFI AND REMOTE CONTROL-Boasting built-in WiFi, this action camera makes it easier to edit and share your videos via the free APP(iSmart Pro) with its signal ranging up to 65ft. Plus a 2.4G wrist remote control, it would be easy and funny to control this action camera
